attributes.action: Honour Captain Tom Moore with a knighthood
attributes.background: Honour Captain Tom Moore with a knighthood after his outstanding efforts, at the age of almost 100, to raise over 10 million (and still rising) for our NHS in these testing times

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
